comment: Ambient mode shows watch battery percent but when lit up does not show anything on bottom.

reply.content: Really? That's strange, because we've definitely tested on moto 360. The bottom card isn't drawn when a peek card is showing, but it doesn't sound like that's the case for you. I'll look into it for the next update.

title: No bottom card on Moto 360
